Text: Curious as to why this 480p version is twice the size of the normal copy (and only a few hundred mb from 720p), and almost 3 times the size of the 480p provided by TvTeam.  If it's due to a higher FPS so be it, but personally I'd prefer a higher resolution with lower fps since the fps difference is negligible.
Thanks for uploading this so quickly! I was seriously bummed thinking I would have to wait until tomorrow to see this. Great quality also...Thanks again!
